entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditorConfig "modern" vs legacy priority revert related documentation updates #74789
    17.12 P2
  • Advanced analysis options are unreliable, confusing and poorly documented #74788
  • Sourcelink does not debug merged partial classes #74787
  • Inconsistent report of CS8156 when using generically constrained interfaces and [UnscopedRef] #74785
    17.12

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35215.202 #74783

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue where output path set in construction never updated the project update state #74791
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in CSharpSyntaxFacts.AppendMembers (again) #74790
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • 17.11 cherry-pick: fix bug with on-the-fly-docs option not working when clicked (#74781) #74786
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test removal of net45 #74784
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose trigger in argument list option to vscode #74792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Copilot option bug #74781
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move net451 test assets to net461 #74766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
